pages.text: $(li)Gazelles are passive creatures that can be found in the Savanna.$(br)$(li)If just one Gazelle is attacked, the whole herd flees.$(br)$(li)Gazelles are very fast, so you will not be able to catch it easily.$(br)$(li)Gazelles may drop Gazelle Horn on death.
You can use an $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Echolocator$(/l) to attract Gazelles
